ModMetaData.name: Common Sense Expansion
ModMetaData.author: Doomster
ModMetaData.description:
Like the well-known "Common Sense" mod, this mod fixes broken game mechanics and bugs, hence its name. Both mods can function independently.
Features: • Sown plants are not cut down when a growing zone is switched to a different plant. • The "Allow cutting" toggle in growing zones only affects sowing. This complements the process of switching to a new plant in the zone. In the original game, only the designated plant can be harvested when cutting is disabled. • Fix bug: Malnutrition ailment doesn't affect hunger rate.
<color=green>Safe to add to an existing save Safe to remove from an existing save</color>
